title: Website Tech Stack Scanner
description: Identify technologies used on websites using smart multi-tier detection: HTTP headers, static HTML, API probing, and browser rendering.

urls.title: Website URLs
urls.description: List of website URLs to analyze for technology stack detection.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of URLs to analyze simultaneously (1-20).

usePlaywrightFallback.title: Use Browser Fallback
usePlaywrightFallback.description: Use Playwright browser rendering for sites with client-side frameworks (React, Vue, etc.).

probeApiEndpoints.title: Probe API Endpoints
probeApiEndpoints.description: Check common API endpoints (/api, /graphql, /wp-json, etc.) to discover backend technologies.

timeout.title: Request Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for each request before timing out.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking and rate limits.
